title: Can You Be Friends with Your Ex? 3 Things to Think About Before You Do
description: When it comes to relationship questions this is probably the toughest one - can you be friends with your ex?Is it the right decision? Well, it’s complicated.Today’s episode I’m going to share with your some of the studies, insights, and thoughts that are going to help you decide for yourself.
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
